title: New York City Is Dead | Guests: Tom Fitton & Dr. Robert Epstein | 8/19/20
description:
The Democrats’ DNC lies continue, as Bill Clinton speaks on the same day that photos dropped of him with one of Jeffrey Epstein’s accusers. Entrepreneur James Altucher explains why he believes New York City is dead forever, but that it may be good for other cities. The world is up for grabs after COVID-19, so do we really want Joe Biden in charge? Judicial Watch president Tom Fitton discusses why mail-in voting fraud is a massive opportunity for Democrats. Dr. Robert Epstein’s Big Tech-monitoring system needs crucial funding in the fight against election manipulation. Glenn’s pre-COVID predictions have all come true. NASA is monitoring a strange anomaly, and an asteroid just barely missed Earth.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
